name: Profbit Server
description: Simple server to OAuth with Coinbase and gather profit statistics.

SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key for the flask application

SOCIAL_AUTH_COINBASE_KEY.description: Your OAuth application key. When registering your app be sure to add the redirect url i.e.  https://app-name.herokuapp.com/complete/coinbase/
SOCIAL_AUTH_COINBASE_KEY.value: Fill in the the key after registering your app: https://coinbase.com/oauth/applications/new

SOCIAL_AUTH_COINBASE_SECRET.value: Get the secret after registering your app: https://coinbase.com/oauth/applications/new

SENTRY_DNS_KEY.description: If you would like to use sentry to record errors, record your key here. https://sentry.io

IS_HEROKU.description: Signals that the server is running on Heroku
